Class ImageObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceshooter.dom.GameObject
      • spaceshooter.dom.ImageObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Charge, Enemy, Player, Projectile, Update

    public abstract class ImageObject
extends GameObject
    Abstract class for all objects that have a sprite.
